model

Class Graph

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgrapht.graph.AbstractGraph<V,E>
      • org.jgrapht.graph.AbstractBaseGraph<V,E>
        • org.jgrapht.graph.SimpleGraph<Vertex,Edge>
          • model.Graph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, org.jgrapht.Graph<Vertex,Edge>, org.jgrapht.UndirectedGraph<Vertex,Edge>

    public class Graph
extends org.jgrapht.graph.SimpleGraph<Vertex,Edge>
    Graph used to display the labyrinth. This graph will set the global map of the labyrinth.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • doesntExist

        public boolean doesntExist(Vertex v,
                           Model.Directions dir)
        Check if the vertex exists in the Graph.
        Parameters:
        v - vertex to check.
        dir - direction to check.
        Returns:

      • getVertexByDir

        public Vertex getVertexByDir(Vertex actual,
                             Model.Directions dir)
        Retrieve the Vertex in the direction dir of the actual Vertex.
        Parameters:
        actual - The Vertex used to search.
        dir - direction were we search the Vertex.
        Returns:
        the specific Vertex if such vertices exist, otherwise return null.

      • getEndPath

        public Vertex getEndPath()
        Retrieve the Vertex as far possible from the origin Vertex. Used to place the door as far possible from the player.
        Returns:
        The specific Vertex.

      • GraphToDot

        public void GraphToDot()
        Write the graph in a .dot file. This method writes the Graph in a .dot file in order to display it with graphviz.

      • isWall

        public boolean isWall(Vertex actual,
                      Model.Directions dir)
        Check if there is a wall between the actual Vertex and the Vertex in the Directions dir.
        Parameters:
        actual - actual Vertex.
        dir - direction to find the target Vertex.
        Returns:
        true if there is a wall, false otherwise.

      • getEdgeByDir

        public Edge getEdgeByDir(Vertex source,
                         Model.Directions dir)
        Return an Edge connecting the source Vertex to a Vertex in the Directions dir.
        Parameters:
        source - source Vertex of the Edge
        dir - Directions to find the target Vertex
        Returns:
        The specific Edge if such edge exist, otherwise return null.

      • isOpenedDoor

        public boolean isOpenedDoor(Vertex actual,
                            Model.Directions dir)
        Check if the Edge ,in Directions dir, is an opened door.
        Parameters:
        actual - actual Vertex.
        dir - Directions to check.
        Returns:
        true if the Edge is an opened door.

      • isClosedDoor

        public boolean isClosedDoor(Vertex actual,
                            Model.Directions dir)
        Check if the Edge, in Directions dir, is a closed door.
        Parameters:
        actual - actual Vertex.
        dir - Directions to check.
        Returns:
        true if the Edge is a closed door or if the Edge doesn't exist.

      • closeDoorRandom

        public Edge closeDoorRandom()
        Close randomly a door from the graph.
        Returns:
        The Edge containing the recently close door.

      • openDoorRandom

        public void openDoorRandom()
        Change the type of a random Edge, from the graph, to OPENNED_DOOR.
